<insert id=insertStudent" parameterType="com.yedam.lms.result.TestResultVO">
SELECT nvl(max(SEQ),0)+1 FROM TESTRESULT
INSERT INTO TESTRESULT (TESTRESULTNUM, TESTSCORE, TESTNUM, CLASSAPPLYNUM) VALUES (#{testresultNum}, #{testScore}, #{testNum}, #{classapplyNum})
SELECT seq,title,writer,content,regDate,cnt FROM BOARD WHERE seq = #{seq}
SELECT seq,title,writer,content,regDate,cnt FROM BOARD
